org.forgerock.openidm.security.impl

Class EntryResourceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.security.impl.SecurityResourceProvider
      • org.forgerock.openidm.security.impl.EntryResourceProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.CollectionResourceProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CertificateResourceProvider, PrivateKeyResourceProvider

    public abstract class EntryResourceProvider
extends SecurityResourceProvider
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.CollectionResourceProvider
    A generic collection resource provider servicing requests on entries in a keystore
